Article.ArticleTitle: The Other Pandemic From the Pandemic: A Higher Frequency of Long COVID After Omicron in Kidney Transplant Recipients.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Transplant and Immunocompromised Host Infectious Diseases, Infectious Diseases Division, Massachusetts General Hospital, Harvard Medical School, Boston, MA.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors declare no funding or conflicts of interest.
